casebody.data:
Jerry L. MORGAN, Executor of the Estate of John W. Morgan
v.
R. Clayton STEINER, M.D., and Moore Surgical Center, P.A. No. 626P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. James B. Maxwell, Durham, for Estate of John Morgan. Mark E. Anderson, Raleigh, for Steiner & Surgical Ctr.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 4th day of November 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."

Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
